Tabulate cases with condition in causal chain by age and site of acquisition

Source: R/compute.R
calc_cc_allcases_by_age_acq.Rd

Tabulate cases with condition in causal chain by age and site of acquisition

calc_cc_allcases_by_age_acq(d, condition, age_groups = NULL, sites = NULL)

Arguments

d

A data object obtained from load_data.
condition

A string specifying the condition to tabulate causal chain presence for. To list all possibilities, see valid_conditions.
age_groups

Optional vector of age groups. See valid_age_groups.
sites

An optional vector of site names to include in the tabulation. If not provided, all sites will be used. See valid_sites.

Examples

calc_cc_allcases_by_age_acq(mock,
  condition = "Klebsiella pneumoniae",
  age_groups = valid_age_subcats(mock)
)
